data.name: Traditional Sword
data.description: A historical Mongolian sword, often adorned with intricate designs on the hilt and scabbard.

data.name: Ger
data.description: A traditional Mongolian round tent made from felt and wood, used by nomadic herders.

data.name: Horse Head Fiddle (Morin Khuur)
data.description: A traditional Mongolian musical instrument resembling a horse's head, played with a bow.

data.name: Traditional Bow
data.description: A historical Mongolian bow, crafted from various materials and used for hunting and warfare.

data.name: Traditional Saddle
data.description: A historical Mongolian saddle designed for horseback riding, often with ornate decorations.

data.name: Traditional Stirrups
data.description: Historical Mongolian stirrups designed to provide stability for riders while mounted on horses.

data.name: Traditional Quiver
data.description: A historical Mongolian quiver used to hold arrows during hunting and warfare.

data.name: Traditional Horse Harness
data.description: Historical Mongolian horse harness used to control and guide horses during various tasks.

data.name: Yurt (Ger)
data.description: A portable, circular tent traditionally used by Mongolian nomads, made from felt and wood.

data.name: Mongol Bow
data.description: A type of recurve bow used by the Mongols for hunting and warfare, known for its power and accuracy.

data.name: Mongolian Spinning Wheel (Uruud)
data.description: A tool used for spinning wool and other fibers, a vital part of traditional Mongolian textile production.

data.name: Mongolian Horsewhip (Uurga)
data.description: A whip made from leather and used by Mongolian herders and horse riders to guide and control their horses.

data.name: Traditional Lasso
data.description: A historical Mongolian lasso, used to catch horses, other livestock, and wild animals.

data.name: Traditional Camel Saddle
data.description: A historical Mongolian saddle designed for camel riding.

params.name: The name or title of the historical item
params.description: A brief description of the item, providing insights into its characteristics and historical significance
params.timePeriod: The historical time period during which the item was in use
params.material: The materials used in the construction of the item
params.usage: The primary purpose or function of the item
params.images: URLs pointing to images representing the item
